Cindy Lee Sheehan (née Miller; Amụrụ nonwaj Julaị 10, 1957) bụ onye America na-emegide agha, onye nwa ya nwoke, U.S

Army Specialist Casey Sheehan, nwụrụ site n'aka ndị iro n'oge Agha Iraq. Ọ dọtara uche ndị mgbasa ozi mba na nke mba ụwa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2005 maka mkpesa ya na-emegide agha n'ogige a na-eme na mpụga ụlọ ọrụ President George W
Bush nke Texas nke dọtara nkwado na nkatọ
Sheehan gbara ọsọ na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma maka Congress n'afọ 2008
Ọ bụ onye na-akatọ iwu mba ọzọ nke Onye isi ala Barack Obama
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta ya, Peace Mom: A Mother's Journey Through Heartache to Activism, n'afọ 2006
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na The Daily Beast n'afọ 2017, Sheehan gara n'ihu na-akatọ George W
Bush, mgbe ọ na-akatwa militarism nke Donald Trump.
